page.title: 15Clubs and Recreation.
page.content: {Rye Golf Club was founded in 1893. It now has 968 members including lady members.Rye is generally recognised as one of the very best and most interesting courses in the Britsh Isles,particularly as a winter course.The English Ladies Championship,{a new 9 hole course {known as the 'Jubilee', has recently {been laid out. } {Rye Harbour Sailing Club was {founded on the 8th August 1934,}the present house being built in 1965. At the moment the club has{200 {members,}who own and sail some 30 cruising yachts and 25 sailing dinghies.The club organises races for the sailing dinghies most weekends,{in {Rye Bay}in the summer in the winter on {the River Rother.}One member sailed round Britain in 1984,another took part in the Fastnet Race.
